üöÄ TTP Agent SDK - Multi-Platform Examples

Integration examples for React, Vue, Angular, Vanilla JS, and more

ü§ñ LLM Implementation Instructions

TTP Agent SDK Implementation Guide for LLM You are helping a user implement the TTP Agent SDK for voice AI integration. Here's everything you need to know: ## SDK Overview The TTP Agent SDK provides two main integration methods: 1. Enhanced AgentWidget (Recommended) - Pre-built UI widget with extensive customization 2. Direct VoiceSDK - Full control over voice interaction for custom implementations ## Installation Methods - CDN: - NPM: npm install ttp-agent-sdk - Import: import { EnhancedAgentWidget, VoiceSDK } from 'ttp-agent-sdk' ## Authentication Flow (Signed URL Method) User's Frontend ‚Üí User's Backend ‚Üí TTP UI Backend ‚Üí TTP Conversation Backend 1. User's frontend requests signed URL from their backend 2. User's backend calls TTP UI Backend: POST https://backend.talktopc.com/api/public/agents 3. TTP UI Backend returns signed URL to user's backend 4. User's backend returns signed URL to frontend 5. Frontend connects directly to TTP Conversation Backend using signed URL ## Method 1: Enhanced AgentWidget (Easiest) Perfect for most use cases. Provides pre-built UI with extensive customization. Key Configuration Options: - agentId: Your agent identifier - getSessionUrl: Function to get signed URL from your backend - icon: Customize icon (microphone, custom image, emoji, text) - position: Set widget position (bottom-right, top-left, etc.) - button: Customize button appearance (colors, size, shape) - panel: Customize chat panel (width, height, colors) - header: Customize panel header (title, colors) - messages: Customize message styling - animation: Enable/disable animations - behavior: Auto-open, auto-connect settings - accessibility: ARIA labels and keyboard navigation ## Method 2: Direct VoiceSDK (Advanced) For developers who need full control over the voice interaction. Key Features: - Real-time audio streaming - WebSocket connection management - Voice activity detection - Custom UI implementation - Event handling (connected, disconnected, recording, messages) ## Platform Support - HTML/JavaScript (Vanilla JS) - React (with hooks and lifecycle management) - Vue.js (with component lifecycle) - Angular (with TypeScript and dependency injection) - Any other frontend framework ## Backend Requirements Your backend needs to: 1. Receive requests from frontend for signed URLs 2. Call TTP UI Backend API: POST https://backend.talktopc.com/api/public/agents 3. Pass agentId and any variables 4. Return the signed URL to frontend ## Common Implementation Steps 1. Choose integration method (Enhanced Widget recommended) 2. Install SDK (CDN or NPM) 3. Set up backend endpoint for signed URL generation 4. Configure widget/SDK with your agentId 5. Implement getSessionUrl function 6. Customize appearance and behavior 7. Test voice interaction ## Error Handling Always implement proper error handling for: - Network connectivity issues - Authentication failures - Audio permission denied - WebSocket connection problems - Backend API errors ## Best Practices - Use Enhanced AgentWidget for most implementations - Implement proper loading states - Handle audio permissions gracefully - Provide fallback UI for unsupported browsers - Test on multiple devices and browsers - Implement proper cleanup on component unmount ## Support Resources - Documentation: https://cdn.talktopc.com/ttp-agent-sdk/ - Examples: https://cdn.talktopc.com/ttp-agent-sdk/examples/ - Signed Link Guide: https://cdn.talktopc.com/ttp-agent-sdk/signed-link-guide.html When helping users implement this SDK, always: 1. Ask about their frontend technology (React, Vue, Angular, etc.) 2. Recommend Enhanced AgentWidget unless they need custom UI 3. Help them set up the backend signed URL endpoint 4. Provide platform-specific code examples 5. Include proper error handling and cleanup 6. Test the implementation thoroughly
üìã Choose Your Platform: This guide provides examples for multiple frontend technologies. Select your preferred platform tab below to see the relevant integration code.

üéØ Method 1: Enhanced AgentWidget (Recommended)

The easiest way to integrate - works with any frontend technology!

index.html
<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Voice Widget Example</title> </head> <body> <h1>My Website</h1> <!-- Load TTP Agent SDK --> <script src="https://cdn.talktopc.com/ttp-agent-sdk/agent-widget.js"></script> <script> // Initialize Enhanced Widget new TTPAgentSDK.EnhancedAgentWidget({ agentId: 'your_agent_id', // Get signed URL from your backend getSessionUrl: async ({ agentId, variables }) => { const response = await fetch('/api/get-voice-session', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ agentId, variables }) }); const data = await response.json(); return data.signedUrl; }, // Customize appearance icon: { type: 'custom', customImage: '/your-logo.png', size: 'large' }, button: { primaryColor: '#4f46e5', hoverColor: '#4338ca', size: 'large' }, position: { vertical: 'bottom', horizontal: 'right', offset: { x: 30, y: 30 } }, variables: { userId: 'user123', page: 'homepage' } }); </script> </body> </html>
VoiceWidget.jsx
import React, { useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { EnhancedAgentWidget } from 'ttp-agent-sdk'; function VoiceWidget() { const widgetRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { if (widgetRef.current) return; widgetRef.current = new EnhancedAgentWidget({ agentId: 'your_agent_id', getSessionUrl: async ({ agentId, variables }) => { const response = await fetch('/api/get-voice-session', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ agentId, variables }) }); const data = await response.json(); return data.signedUrl; }, icon: { type: 'custom', customImage: '/logo.png', size: 'large' }, button: { primaryColor: '#4f46e5', hoverColor: '#4338ca' }, position: { vertical: 'bottom', horizontal: 'right' }, variables: { userId: 'user123', page: 'homepage' } }); return () => { if (widgetRef.current) { widgetRef.current.destroy(); widgetRef.current = null; } }; }, []); return null; // Widget renders itself } export default VoiceWidget;
VoiceWidget.vue
<template> <div><!-- Widget renders itself --></div> </template> <script> import { EnhancedAgentWidget } from 'ttp-agent-sdk'; export default { name: 'VoiceWidget', mounted() { this.widget = new EnhancedAgentWidget({ agentId: 'your_agent_id', getSessionUrl: async ({ agentId, variables }) => { const response = await fetch('/api/get-voice-session', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ agentId, variables }) }); const data = await response.json(); return data.signedUrl; }, icon: { type: 'custom', customImage: '/logo.png', size: 'large' }, button: { primaryColor: '#4f46e5', hoverColor: '#4338ca' }, position: { vertical: 'bottom', horizontal: 'right' }, variables: { userId: 'user123', page: 'homepage' } }); }, beforeUnmount() { if (this.widget) { this.widget.destroy(); } } }; </script>
voice-widget.component.ts
import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core'; import { EnhancedAgentWidget } from 'ttp-agent-sdk'; @Component({ selector: 'app-voice-widget', template: '<div><!-- Widget renders itself --></div>' }) export class VoiceWidgetComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { private widget: any; ngOnInit() { this.widget = new EnhancedAgentWidget({ agentId: 'your_agent_id', getSessionUrl: async ({ agentId, variables }) => { const response = await fetch('/api/get-voice-session', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify({ agentId, variables }) }); const data = await response.json(); return data.signedUrl; }, icon: { type: 'custom', customImage: '/logo.png', size: 'large' }, button: { primaryColor: '#4f46e5', hoverColor: '#4338ca' }, position: { vertical: 'bottom', horizontal: 'right' }, variables: { userId: 'user123', page: 'homepage' } }); } ngOnDestroy() { if (this.widget) { this.widget.destroy(); } } }

üîß Method 2: Direct VoiceSDK Integration

For developers who want full control over the voice interaction.

voice-app.js
<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Voice App</title> </head> <body> <div id="app"> <h1>Voice Chat</h1> <button id="connectBtn">Connect</button> <button id="recordBtn" disabled>Start Recording</button> <div id="messages"></div> </div> <script src="https://cdn.talktopc.com/ttp-agent-sdk/agent-widget.js"></script> <script> class VoiceApp { constructor() { this.isConnected = false; this.isRecording = false; this.messages = []; this.voiceSDK = null; this.init(); } init() { this.voiceSDK = new TTPAgentSDK.VoiceSDK({ websocketUrl: 'wss://speech.talktopc.com/ws/conv', agentId: 'your_agent_id', appId: 'your_app_id' }); this.setupEventHandlers(); this.setupUI(); } setupEventHandlers() { this.voiceSDK.on('connected', () => { this.isConnected = true; this.updateUI(); this.addMessage('system', 'Connected to voice agent'); }); this.voiceSDK.on('disconnected', () => { this.isConnected = false; this.isRecording = false; this.updateUI(); this.addMessage('system', 'Disconnected'); }); this.voiceSDK.on('recordingStarted', () => { this.isRecording = true; this.updateUI(); this.addMessage('user', 'üé§ Recording...'); }); this.voiceSDK.on('recordingStopped', () => { this.isRecording = false; this.updateUI(); }); this.voiceSDK.on('message', (message) => { if (message.type === 'agent_response') { this.addMessage('agent', message.agent_response); } }); } setupUI() { document.getElementById('connectBtn').onclick = () => this.connect(); document.getElementById('recordBtn').onclick = () => this.toggleRecording(); } async connect() { try { await this.voiceSDK.connect(); } catch (error) { this.addMessage('error', `Connection failed: ${error.message}`); } } async toggleRecording() { try { if (this.isRecording) { await this.voiceSDK.stopRecording(); } else { await this.voiceSDK.startRecording(); } } catch (error) { this.addMessage('error', `Recording failed: ${error.message}`); } } addMessage(type, text) { this.messages.push({ type, text, timestamp: new Date() }); this.renderMessages(); } renderMessages() { const container = document.getElementById('messages'); container.innerHTML = this.messages.map(msg => ` <div class="message ${msg.type}"> <strong>${msg.type}:</strong> ${msg.text} <small>${msg.timestamp.toLocaleTimeString()}</small> </div> `).join(''); } updateUI() { const connectBtn = document.getElementById('connectBtn'); const recordBtn = document.getElementById('recordBtn'); connectBtn.disabled = this.isConnected; connectBtn.textContent = this.isConnected ? 'Connected' : 'Connect'; recordBtn.disabled = !this.isConnected; recordBtn.textContent = this.isRecording ? 'Stop Recording' : 'Start Recording'; } } // Initialize app new VoiceApp(); </script> </body> </html>
VoiceChat.jsx
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import { VoiceSDK } from 'ttp-agent-sdk'; function VoiceChat() { const [isConnected, setIsConnected] = useState(false); const [isRecording, setIsRecording] = useState(false); const [messages, setMessages] = useState([]); const voiceSDKRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const voiceSDK = new VoiceSDK({ websocketUrl: 'wss://speech.talktopc.com/ws/conv', agentId: 'your_agent_id', appId: 'your_app_id' }); voiceSDK.on('connected', () => setIsConnected(true)); voiceSDK.on('disconnected', () => setIsConnected(false)); voiceSDK.on('recordingStarted', () => setIsRecording(true)); voiceSDK.on('recordingStopped', () => setIsRecording(false)); voiceSDK.on('message', (message) => { if (message.type === 'agent_response') { setMessages(prev => [...prev, { type: 'agent', text: message.agent_response }]); } }); voiceSDKRef.current = voiceSDK; return () => voiceSDK.destroy(); }, []); const handleConnect = async () => { await voiceSDKRef.current.connect(); }; const handleToggleRecording = async () => { if (isRecording) { await voiceSDKRef.current.stopRecording(); } else { await voiceSDKRef.current.startRecording(); } }; return ( <div> <button onClick={handleConnect} disabled={isConnected}> {isConnected ? 'Connected' : 'Connect'} </button> <button onClick={handleToggleRecording} disabled={!isConnected}> {isRecording ? 'Stop Recording' : 'Start Recording'} </button> <div> {messages.map((msg, i) => ( <div key={i}><strong>{msg.type}:</strong> {msg.text}</div> ))} </div> </div> ); } export default VoiceChat;
VoiceChat.vue
<template> <div> <h1>Voice Chat</h1> <button @click="connect" :disabled="isConnected"> {{ isConnected ? 'Connected' : 'Connect' }} </button> <button @click="toggleRecording" :disabled="!isConnected"> {{ isRecording ? 'Stop Recording' : 'Start Recording' }} </button> <div> <div v-for="(msg, i) in messages" :key="i"> <strong>{{ msg.type }}:</strong> {{ msg.text }} </div> </div> </div> </template> <script> import { VoiceSDK } from 'ttp-agent-sdk'; export default { name: 'VoiceChat', data() { return { isConnected: false, isRecording: false, messages: [], voiceSDK: null }; }, mounted() { this.voiceSDK = new VoiceSDK({ websocketUrl: 'wss://speech.talktopc.com/ws/conv', agentId: 'your_agent_id', appId: 'your_app_id' }); this.voiceSDK.on('connected', () => this.isConnected = true); this.voiceSDK.on('disconnected', () => this.isConnected = false); this.voiceSDK.on('recordingStarted', () => this.isRecording = true); this.voiceSDK.on('recordingStopped', () => this.isRecording = false); this.voiceSDK.on('message', (message) => { if (message.type === 'agent_response') { this.messages.push({ type: 'agent', text: message.agent_response }); } }); }, beforeUnmount() { if (this.voiceSDK) { this.voiceSDK.destroy(); } }, methods: { async connect() { await this.voiceSDK.connect(); }, async toggleRecording() { if (this.isRecording) { await this.voiceSDK.stopRecording(); } else { await this.voiceSDK.startRecording(); } } } }; </script>
voice-chat.component.ts
import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core'; import { VoiceSDK } from 'ttp-agent-sdk'; @Component({ selector: 'app-voice-chat', template: ` <div> <h1>Voice Chat</h1> <button (click)="connect()" [disabled]="isConnected"> {{ isConnected ? 'Connected' : 'Connect' }} </button> <button (click)="toggleRecording()" [disabled]="!isConnected"> {{ isRecording ? 'Stop Recording' : 'Start Recording' }} </button> <div> <div *ngFor="let msg of messages; let i = index"> <strong>{{ msg.type }}:</strong> {{ msg.text }} </div> </div> </div> ` }) export class VoiceChatComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { isConnected = false; isRecording = false; messages: any[] = []; private voiceSDK: any; ngOnInit() { this.voiceSDK = new VoiceSDK({ websocketUrl: 'wss://speech.talktopc.com/ws/conv', agentId: 'your_agent_id', appId: 'your_app_id' }); this.voiceSDK.on('connected', () => this.isConnected = true); this.voiceSDK.on('disconnected', () => this.isConnected = false); this.voiceSDK.on('recordingStarted', () => this.isRecording = true); this.voiceSDK.on('recordingStopped', () => this.isRecording = false); this.voiceSDK.on('message', (message: any) => { if (message.type === 'agent_response') { this.messages.push({ type: 'agent', text: message.agent_response }); } }); } ngOnDestroy() { if (this.voiceSDK) { this.voiceSDK.destroy(); } } async connect() { await this.voiceSDK.connect(); } async toggleRecording() { if (this.isRecording) { await this.voiceSDK.stopRecording(); } else { await this.voiceSDK.startRecording(); } } }

HTML/JSVanilla JavaScript

Works with any HTML page. No build tools required. Perfect for simple websites.

ReactReact Integration

Full React component integration with hooks and lifecycle management.

VueVue.js Integration

Vue component examples with proper lifecycle hooks and reactive data.

AngularAngular Integration

Angular component examples with TypeScript and proper dependency injection.

üí° Recommendation: For most use cases, use Method 1 (Enhanced AgentWidget) as it provides the best user experience with minimal code. Use Method 2 (Direct VoiceSDK) only when you need custom UI or advanced control over the voice interaction.
